text: @GregAbbott_TX @TDEM Where are you getting your numbers Gov Abbott? There are 29 million who live in TX. There have only been 6 million tests provided to date. How in the hell can you possibly know the number of recovered and active #COVID19 cases? #TestingForCovid19 #TestTraceIsolate
